title.rendered: New Orleans Walls of Books Coming Soon!

content.rendered:
Training for the new store begins in March.  Expecting Opening Date: Mid-May 2014.

We are ready to take a Walls of Books to New Orleans, LA!

excerpt.rendered: Training for the new store begins in March.  Expecting Opening Date: Mid-May 2014. We are ready to take a Walls of Books to New Orleans, LA!
